comments.body: You should give more details of what you want to offer, this thing of doing it by telegramÂ  will not achieve anything, here you are required to show evidence, videos, or at least photos so that they can believe you, the people here are not stupid at all, so if what you try is to make you achieve some kind of visualization you have to try harder, I would even recommend that you pay a copper subscription so that you can do everything in a better way, you can publish images and you can even do something live and direct if you want and I think that even so it will be difficult for them to believe, because you are practically saying that you can beat algorithms that have very advanced programming.
